info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 08 at 4:18PM CST until January 08 at 4:45PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN TYLER...EASTERN HARDIN AND SOUTHEASTERN JASPER COUNTIES... At 417 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kountze, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Silsbee, Kountze, Buna, Evadale, Fred, and Caney Head. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for southeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
